SEARCH
Package com.example.summit.model

Class EventPoster

java.lang.Object
com.example.summit.model.EventPoster
public class EventPoster extends Object
Wrapper class that combines event and organizer information for displaying in admin image gallery.

This class simplifies the data needed for the admin image moderation feature by combining relevant event details with organizer information into a single object.
